p: In addition, this study showed that the extract possessed potent antioxidant properties, free radical scavenging activity, and ferric reducing antioxidant power. Furthermore, the total antioxidant capacity (TAC) of the extract was similar to that of ascorbic acid, a well-known direct antioxidant. Previous studies showed that the essential oils from the leaves of A. zerumbet have potent antioxidant effects, in accordance with our study [ 17]. The antioxidant effects of the extract may be attributed to the phenolic acids and flavonoids content of the extract, which possess a potent antioxidant potential.
